game.beginning: In a post-apocalyptic world where a cataclysmic event known as "The Great Disaster" has ravaged the planet, humanity is on the brink of extinction.
game.ending: The fate of humanity rests in your hands, and you emerge victorious after defeating the source of the corruption. With newfound hope, the survivors rebuild their communities, ushering in a brighter future.
game.synopsis: In this action-adventure game, you play as Ava, a skilled survivor who possesses unique abilities to manipulate technology with her mind. You're tasked with navigating treacherous landscapes and fighting against rival factions vying for control of the remaining resources. Along the way, uncover the truth behind The Great Disaster and confront the forces seeking to exploit it.
game.title: Echoes of Eternity
